channel.title: Comments on: Hostelworld founder Ray Nolan launches new startup – worky.com

item.title: By: Ivan | Jobs Blog
item.dc:creator: Ivan | Jobs Blog
item.description:
Worky looks fantastic! But the business model shows lack of understanding the recruitment process in Ireland. Sites like http://www.JobsMarket.ie/ and similar niche ones are going to dominate the market, and Worky will not have an answer.
Or I do not understand the online recruitment at all! :)
item.content:encoded:
Worky looks fantastic! But the business model shows lack of understanding the recruitment process in Ireland. Sites like http://www.JobsMarket.ie/ and similar niche ones are going to dominate the market, and Worky will not have an answer.

Or I do not understand the online recruitment at all!

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Aimed at disrupting the recruitmet market? By that do you mean it's not just another website full of recruitment agency ads? Because, at the moment, all I see on it is recruitment agency ads! :-)
item.content:encoded: Aimed at disrupting the recruitmet market? By that do you mean it’s not just another website full of recruitment agency ads? Because, at the moment, all I see on it is recruitment agency ads!
